data.title: Company Profile
data.meta_description: Biba - Internet first brand of ethnic apparel wear for women. Raised a total funding of $57.3M over 5 rounds from 15 investors. Valued at $126M. Founded by Meena Bindra in the year 1988. Biba has 626 competitors.

Biba - About the company

What does Biba do?

Internet first brand of ethnic apparel wear for women. It offers a wide range of products includes tops, lehenga, suits, salwar kameez sets, kurtas, kurtis, gowns. It also offers fashion jewelry across the categories of necklaces, earrings, bangles, bracelets, handbags, fragrances, and footwear products such as slippers & sandals, sandals, loafers, and heels.

Which sectors and market segments does Biba operate in?

Biba serves in the B2C space in the Consumer Goods market segments.

The primary business model of Biba is :Consumer Goods > Apparel Brands > ***** **** > ***** ******

How much funding has Biba raised till date?

Biba has raised a total funding of $57.3M over 5 round s. Its first funding round was on Dec 08, 2006.

What are the most recent funding rounds of Biba?

Its latest funding round was a Series B round on Jul 30, 2020 for $5.35M. 1 investor participated in its latest round, lead by Warburg Pincus.

Who are Biba's investors?

Biba has 8 institutional investor s including Future Group, Warburg Pincus and Dhanvan Impex. Warburg Pincus is the largest institutional investor in Biba . Priyanka Chawla and 6 other s are Angel Investors in Biba .

View details of Biba funding rounds and investors

Biba's founders and board of directors

Founder? Claim Profile

Who are the founders of Biba?

The founders of Biba is Meena Bindra.

Who is on the board of Biba?

Biba 's board has 6 active member s . Meena Bindra, Siddharath Bindra and Anish Saraf are part of team and Gagan Singh is independent board member .

How many employees does Biba have?

Biba has 2,522 employees as of Mar 24. The total employee count is 2.8% more than what it was in Mar 23.

Biba's Competitors and alternates

Who are the competitors of Biba?

Top competitor s of Biba include Fashor, Koskii and W.

Biba ranks 1 st among 463 active competitors. 21 of its competitors are funded while 5 have exited. Overall, Biba and its competitors have raised over $149M in funding across 42 funding rounds involving 349 investors. There are 2 public and 3 acquired companies in the entire competition set.

Frequently asked questions about Biba

When was Biba founded?

Biba was founded in 1988.

Where is Biba located?

Biba is located in Gurugram, India.

Is Biba a funded company?

Biba is a funded company, its first funding round was on Dec 08, 2006.

When was the latest funding round of Biba?

Biba's latest funding round was on Jul 30, 2020.

How much is Biba worth?

The latest valuation of Biba is $126M as on Jul 30, 2020.

What is the annual revenue of Biba?

Annual revenue of Biba is $111M as on Mar 31, 2023.

Is Biba a Apparel Brands company?

The primary sector of Biba is Apparel Brands.
